title: Traderboard
author: Traderboard
content: Hi, Traderboard.app is a tool to automatically copytrade Binance Leaderboard traders in real time.We currently have a referral program which provides you 20% of all the income + renewals you bring in.This can be raised to 40% if you can bring more than 20 customers.For any of you interested in affiliate marketing or partnership our team will gladly answer any question!
